title: Information: Asking for Assistance (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Asking for Assistance subcategory within Information. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Do you have a Spanish information guide?
cards.romaji: Supeingo no gaido wa arimasu ka?
cards.japanese: スペイン語のガイドはありますか？

cards.english: Do you have a Chinese info guide?
cards.romaji: Chugokugo no gaido wa arimasu ka?
cards.japanese: 中国語のガイドはありますか？
